Title: Expressions of interest
Description: The total number of unique expressions of interest received.

Title: Bids
Description: The total number of unique bids received (prior to any being discounted for not meeting essential criteria).

Title: Valid bids
Description: The total number of unique bids received that were considered valid against relevant criteria (either of the bidder, or the bid submission itself). All valid bids are considered during the tender evaluation stage.

Title: Disqualified bids
Description: The number of bids that were found inadmissible. A bid is found inadmissible where it has been verified that it has been submitted by a tenderer who has been excluded or who did not meet the selection criteria, or when it is not in conformity with the technical specifications, or is irregular (e.g. it was received late, having an abnormally low price or cost), unacceptable or unsuitable.

Title: Lowest valid bid value
Description: The value of the lowest valid bid.

Title: Highest valid bid value
Description: The value of the highest valid bid.

Title: Bidders
Description: The total number of unique organizations or consortia submitting bids  (prior to any being discounted for not meeting essential criteria).

Title: Qualified bidders
Description: The total number of unique organizations or consortia passing the qualification stage of the evaluation process.

Title: Disqualified bidders
Description: The total number of unique organizations or consortia that did not pass the qualification stage of the evaluation process.

Title: Electronic bids
Description: The number of bids received by electronic means.

Title: Bids from micro companies
Description: The number of bids received from micro enterprises.

Title: Bids from SMEs
Description: The number of bids received from small and medium enterprises.

Title: Bids from small companies
Description: The number of bids received from small enterprises.

Title: Bids from medium companies
Description: The number of bids received from medium enterprises.

Title: Bids from foreign firms
Description: The number of bids received from bidders from outside the country where the tender is issued.

Title: Bids from firms in other European Economic Area countries
Description: The number of bids received from tenderers from other European Economic Area countries.

Title: Bids from firms in non-European Economic Area countries
Description: The number of bids received from tenderers from non-European Economic Area countries.

Title: Tenders excluded because they were abnormally low
Description: The number of tenders excluded because they were abnormally low. Note that in some EU datasets this might have been converted from a boolean, such that a value of 1 would indicate "1 or more" tenders were excluded. Users need to evaluate and interpret data accordingly.
